node.title: Golden Wallet Sweepstakes Grand Prize Winner
node.content:
Renee Walls, United States

“My name is Renee from Pennsylvania. I work as a Graphic Designer but my biggest passion is my family. I am a married mother of 4 children ranging in ages 3 to 14 years old! We live a typical middle-class lifestyle, which includes work, school, sports and church! 

Through the hustle and bustle of our everyday lives my husband and I strive to set goals that will secure a promising future for our children. My husband Paul introduced me to Crypto about a year ago. We have been slowly learning and growing our digital currencies day by day. This is how I came to know of BTT. It is important to believe in the companies that make the products you use. My family trusts and believes that BitTorrent has a bright future filled with innovation and promise.

Winning the Golden Wallet Sweepstakes was an incredible surprise! Not only did I win, but I won the grand prize! I plan to support BitTorrent and Tron as they continue to innovate.

I want to give a huge thank you to the BitTorrent company and staff for blessing my family with this incredible Grand Prize that will surely have a great impact on our lives. We are forever grateful.”
